last_episode_to_air.name: A New Hope
last_episode_to_air.overview: Each year Hope rescues and rehabilitates over 1000 animals. Now it is spring and she must release the last of her deer - but are they all ready to return to the wild?

name: Hope for Wildlife
overview: Wildlife rehabilitation expert Hope Swinimer and her dedicated team rescue and heal injured and orphaned animals of all kinds. Hope's passion for wildlife conservation shines through everything she does as she and her team go on difficult missions to care for and return each animal to the wild.
